segments.text: Observing this scene, the overflowing sink catches my eye first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is wasting away, pouring onto the floor like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't even notice, too busy with her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle—it's gross how unaware she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the children, sneaking cookies from the high cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that stool, it's filthy with all the water nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He'll probably drop crumbs everywhere, making more mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting eagerly, hand out like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is neat, not like this sloppy interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel disgusted by the carelessness in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, water everywhere—it's all so unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is open, inviting more trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is just begging for a nasty accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
